meanings.sent1: She is trialing a new recipe for dinner tonight.
meanings.sent2: Scientists often trial new medications before releasing them to the public.
meanings.sent3: The chef was trialing a bizarre combination of ingredients in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The students were trialing different study methods to see which one worked best.
meanings.sent5: The company is trialing a new software system to improve efficiency.

meanings.definition: Participating in a trial or test
meanings.sent1: The trialing participants were eager to see the results.
meanings.sent2: She felt nervous about being part of the trialing group.
meanings.sent3: The trialing team celebrated after completing the challenge successfully.
meanings.sent4: The trialing athletes pushed themselves to the limit during the competition.
meanings.sent5: The trialing students were excited to showcase their project to the judges.

meanings.definition: The act of undergoing a trial or test
meanings.sent1: The trialing of the new product was met with positive feedback.
meanings.sent2: She was selected to participate in the trialing of the prototype.
meanings.sent3: The trialing of the new technology brought unexpected challenges.
meanings.sent4: The trialing of the vaccine showed promising results in the initial stages.
meanings.sent5: The company invested in the trialing of different marketing strategies to boost sales.
